## Paperless API ###

Stage : http://pda-rct3.pv-cp.net

# authenticate

POST {{host}}/v1/paperless/authenticate

body
{
    "clientId": "PAP3RL3SS",
    "deviceId": "TEST#JMBC"
}

# numero

POST {{host}}/v1/paperless/numero 

body
{
    "clientId": "PAP3RL3SS",
    "uid": "05484",
    "cottage": "3156"
}

Stage 2019-03-14
{
    "clientId":"PAP3RL3SS",
    "uid":"0422793A904F80",
    "cottage":"414"
}

{
    "clientId":"PAP3RL3SS",
    "uid":"046B0FF2074480",
    "cottage":"3410"
}

booking de test en rct 190797628, uid 02444E3A087560, cottage 3409

# Activities

GET {{host}}/v1/paperless/activities?booking={{lima}}&uid={{uid}}

# Services

GET {{host}}/v1/paperless/services?booking={{lima}}&uid={{uid}}

# payments

GET {{host}}/v1/paperless/payments?booking={{lima}}&uid={{uid}}
